name: SCP: Project Unreal
description:
An attempt to recreate SCP: Containment Breach using Unreal Engine 4.

I plan on recreating the base game and add my own stuff such as updated models and textures and new scp's later on, while keeping the original Artstyle of the game.

Controls:
___________________________
Walk: Wasd

Sprint: LShift

Crouch: LCtrl

Inventory: Tab

Pause: Escape

Blink: Spacebar

Use Item: doubleclick left mouse button

Drop Item: doubleclick right mouse button

interact: left mousebutton

cancel itemusage: tab
___________________________
